::Koj::
"Inu reroute the bullet for two way talk."

::Inu::
"Already done."

::Koj::
"This all I can stand I can't stand no more."

::Hologram::
It stands its eyes glow green "I'm going to beg or plea. But I do have one 
thing to say." Thinks long and hard. "YEAH I STOLE PARTS FROM THE CF TO DO 
SOMETHING GREATER. IT BEATS SITTING ON MY ASS AND WAITING TO FADE IN TO THE 
DARKNESS LIKE THE REST OF YOU MAXIMALS. YOU'VE ALL BECOME COWARDS THAT ARE 
HIDING BEHIND THE CF! WHEN A HALF-BREED HAS SHOWN MORE COURAGE IN A BATTLE 
THAT IS NOT HIS OWN THERE IS SOMETHING WRONG !" Koj takes breath and his 
tone changes more to a sarcastic "WE ARE THE MAXIMALS WE HAVE ONE OF 
STRONGEST BASES IN WORLD BUT WE CAN'T EVEN PROTECT ONE SHIP. WELL WHAT GOOD 
IS THE STUPID FORTRESS IF ALL YOU EVER DO IS HIDE IN IT. I REFUSE TO BELIEVE 
THAT YOUR ARE LILLY'S PEOPLE SHE SENT ME TO PROTECT. EVEN THE PREDS HAVE 
SHOWN MORE COURAGE. IF YOU WANT TO BE CRUSHED UNDER THE RULE OF THE PREDS 
THAT YOUR CHOICE BUT NOT MY DESTINY." KOJ STILL GETTING PISSED. "I'M A 
WARRIOR SOMETHING YOU ALL SEEM TO FORGET THE MEANING OF Iï¿½M NOT GOING TO 
HIDE!"


::?1-6? PLUS INU ALL LOOK AT KOJ THEN CONTINUE THERE REPAIRS::

::INU::
"DAMN! DON'T GIVE KOJ ANY EXPLOSIVE RIGHT NOW." not knowing what to say.

::Koj::
Koj getting focused "IF YOU WANT SOMETHING YOU GET OFF YOUR ASS GET ON YOUR 
FEET AND MAKE HAPPEN ITS NOT GOING TO COME TO YOU. WHY DON'T YOU GO MEDITATE 
ON THAT! WHILE I GET OUT THERE AND MAKE MY DESTINY HAPPEN."
